title: GOP’s Klan Hood Showing, TikTok To Hollywood Pipeline 3.24.22

description:
In episode 1211, Jack and Miles are joined by writer and host of How To Citizen, Baratunde Thurston to discuss… Mike Braun’s Klan hood slipped off in an interview?, Mo Brooks WORE BODY ARMOR on Jan 6 and THIS is the thanks he gets?, The TikTok to Hollywood pipeline and more!

  1. Mike Braun’s Klan hood slipped off in an interview?
  2. Mo Brooks WORE BODY ARMOR on Jan 6 and THIS is the thanks he gets?
  3. The TikTok to Hollywood pipeline

LISTEN: Wood Trees by Begin
